attributes.action: Stop selling protected greenfield land for cheap to building companies
attributes.additional_details:
Stop the declassification and sale of greenfield land to big businesses 

The government has declassified 2400 acres of greenfield land ready for sale to large building companies under the guise of "affordable housing" this land should be protected not urbanised.

Large companies have no intention of protecting any of these environments or conserving or eco building.
attributes.background: Stop the sale of 2400acres of greenfield land to building companies for urbanisation

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  We're not aware of the Government selling any land for development

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
